body.p:
Touching the Harmonic button in the navigation buttons displays the Harmonics screen (). Harmonics Screen
The Harmonics screen displays harmonics for
STS output voltage harmonics as percent of total waveform.
STS output current harmonics at percent of total waveform.

Harmonics are represented in a bar chart and each phase has a color-coded bar: Phase A is black, Phase B is red, and Phase C is blue. The yellow bar on the left side of the panel represents the Total Harmonic Distortion (THD). AC harmonics are always odd-numbered (3rd, 5th, 7th harmonic, etc.).
